name: ERSTE BANK HUNGARY Zártkörűen Működő Részvénytársaság
bossPosition: CEO, Chairman of the Board of Directors
goal:
Erste Bank Hunagry Zrt. was founded in 1986 as the member of Erste Group AG.
As a key financial services provider in Hungary, Erste Bank Hungary's key business is the retail business, covering the entire spectrum from lending, deposit and investment products to current accounts and credit cards.
Besides the traditional strength in serving private individuals, Erste Bank Hungary's core activities also include advisory services and support for corporate clients in financing.
Erste Bank Hungary is strongly committed to offering a comprehensive range of financial products to meet its customer needs.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Regional Policy, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: In 2019/ 2020 the main EU initiatives including CRD IV/CRR, SSM, BRRD, SRM, DGSD, EMIR, MiFID, PRIIPS, Retail Financial Services Action Plan, Taxes and Digitalisation, Sustainable Finance, CMU, Investment Treaties
